catalog_script_client.name: Populate User's location

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_9c7044682ff131100e05235df699b650
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request loaner vehicle">2de722b02f2131100e05235df699b67c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:423feeb42f2131100e05235df699b6b8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate User's location</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   //This line is to get the info from the "requested for user
   var user = g_form.getReference( 'requested_for',callback);
   //This function below grabs the location info and paste it in the form.
function callback(user)
   {
  g_form.setValue('office_location',user.location);
   }
   }]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-06 21:33:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9c7044682ff131100e05235df699b650</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate User's location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory." source="x_919130_loaner_0">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory.">be241cba2f1571100e05235df699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9c7044682ff131100e05235df699b650</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-06 22:01:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
